Labs","details":"This contract implements health checks for lending positions by comparing the value      of a user's collateral against their borrowed amount and the loan-to-value (LTV) ratio.      It prevents users from borrowing more than their collateral can safely support. Key Features: - Multi-token collateral support across different chains - Real-time price feed integration via TokenDataStream - Configurable loan-to-value ratios per token - Automatic liquidation threshold detection - Precision handling for different token decimals","errors":{"ExceedsMaxLTV(uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"borrowValue":"Total value user is trying to borrow","ltv":"The loan-to-value ratio (e.g., 0.6e18 = 60%)","maxBorrowValue":"Maximum borrow value allowed by LTV"}}],"InvalidLtv(address,uint256)":[{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","ltv":"The invalid LTV ratio that was provided"}}],"LiquidationAlert(uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"borrowValue":"Total value of borrowed assets","liquidationThreshold":"The liquidation threshold (e.g., 0.85e18 = 85%)","maxCollateralValue":"Maximum collateral value at liquidation threshold"}}],"LiquidationBonusNotSet(address)":[{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address"}}],"LiquidationThresholdNotSet(address)":[{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address"}}],"LtvMustBeLessThanThreshold(address,uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","ltv":"The loan-to-value ratio","threshold":"The liquidation threshold"}}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ZeroCollateralAmount(address,uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","totalCollateral":"Total collateral in the system","userCollateralAmount":"User's collateral amount"}}]},"events":{"FactorySet(address)":{"params":{"factory":"The new factory address"}},"LiquidationBonusSet(address,uint256)":{"params":{"bonus":"The liquidation bonus value","lendingPool":"The lending pool address"}},"LiquidationThresholdSet(address,uint256)":{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","threshold":"The liquidation threshold value"}},"MaxLiquidationPercentageSet(uint256)":{"params":{"percentage":"The new maximum liquidation percentage"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"checkLiquidatable(address,address)":{"details":"Returns (true, 0, 0, 0) if user has no borrows","params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","user":"The user address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"isLiquidatable Boolean indicating if position can be liquidated","_1":"borrowValue Total value of user's borrowed assets","_2":"maxCollateralValue Maximum collateral value considering liquidation threshold","_3":"liquidationAllocation Bonus allocation for liquidator"}},"constructor":{"details":"Sets up Ownable with deployer as owner and configures the factory"},"isHealthy(address,address)":{"details":"Checks both LTV ratio (for borrowing) and liquidation threshold (for position health).      First validates against LTV to prevent over-borrowing, then checks liquidation threshold.","params":{"_router":"The lending pool contract address","_user":"The user address whose position is being checked"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setFactory(address)":{"details":"Only the contract owner can call this function","params":{"_factory":"The new factory contract address"}},"setLiquidationBonus(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by factory contract","params":{"_router":"The lending pool router address","bonus":"The liquidation bonus value (e.g., 0.05e18 = 5% bonus)"}},"setLiquidationThreshold(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by factory contract. LTV must be less than threshold.","params":{"_router":"The lending pool router address","_threshold":"The liquidation threshold value (e.g., 0.85e18 = 85%)"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). checkLiquidatable(address,address).details: Returns (true, 0, 0, 0) if user has no borrows

returns._0: isLiquidatable Boolean indicating if position can be liquidated
returns._1: borrowValue Total value of user's borrowed assets
returns._2: maxCollateralValue Maximum collateral value considering liquidation threshold

constructor.details: Sets up Ownable with deployer as owner and configures the factory

isHealthy(address,address).details: Checks both LTV ratio (for borrowing) and liquidation threshold (for position health).      First validates against LTV to prevent over-borrowing, then checks liquidation threshold.

params._user: The user address whose position is being checked

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFactory(address).details: Only the contract owner can call this function

setLiquidationThreshold(address,uint256).details: Only callable by factory contract. LTV must be less than threshold.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

checkLiquidatable(address,address).notice: Checks if a user's position is liquidatable and returns liquidation details

constructor.notice: Initializes the IsHealthy contract with a factory address

factory().notice: Address of the Factory contract for accessing protocol configurations

isHealthy(address,address).notice: Validates whether a user's borrowing position is healthy

liquidationBonus(address).notice: Liquidation bonus for each collateral token (with 18 decimals precision)

liquidationThreshold(address).notice: Liquidation threshold for each collateral token (with 18 decimals precision)

setLiquidationBonus(address,uint256).notice: Sets the liquidation bonus for a lending pool

setLiquidationThreshold(address,uint256).notice: Sets the liquidation threshold for a lending pool
